## OmvDataSourceParameters.gatherFeatureIds property

Gather feature IDs from `OmvData`<!-- -->. Defaults to `false`<!-- -->. @<!-- -->deprecated, FeatureIds are always gathered, use \[\[gatherFeatureAttributes\]\] to gather all feature attributes.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
gatherFeatureIds?: boolean;
```
